statements: SELECT * FROM historical_debt_data;
SELECT customer_name, debt_amount FROM historical_debt_data ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT id, customer_name, debt_date FROM historical_debt_data WHERE debt_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM historical_debt_data WHERE debt_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, debt_amount FROM historical_debt_data WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM historical_debt_data WHERE debt_amount > 1000 ORDER BY debt_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, debt_amount FROM historical_debt_data WHERE debt_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(debt_amount) AS total_debt FROM historical_debt_data GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_debt > 3000;
SELECT customer_name, debt_amount, debt_date FROM historical_debt_data WHERE debt_date >= '2022-01-01' AND debt_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS debt_count FROM historical_debt_data GROUP BY customer_name HAVING debt_count > 2 ORDER BY debt_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM debt_data
SELECT debtor_name, amount, payment_date FROM debt_data
SELECT debt_type, debtor_name, payment_date, amount FROM debt_data
SELECT * FROM debt_data WHERE debtor_name = 'Alice'
SELECT debtor_name, amount FROM debt_data ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM debt_data WHERE debt_type = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT debtor_name, amount FROM debt_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY debtor_name DESC;
SELECT id, debtor_name, amount, payment_date FROM debt_data WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_debts, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM debt_data WHERE debtor_name LIKE 'A%' AND debt_type = 'Loan';
SELECT * FROM debt_data WHERE debtor_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY id ASC, debtor_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM debts;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM debts WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM customers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT debt_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_paid FROM payments GROUP BY debt_id HAVING total_amount_paid > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM debts WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM debts GROUP BY id, customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customers.name, debts.amount FROM customers INNER JOIN debts ON customers.id = debts.customer_id WHERE debts.date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, SUM(payments.amount) AS total_payments FROM customers LEFT JOIN payments ON customers.id = payments.debt_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING total_payments > 500;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_debt_amount FROM debts;
SELECT * FROM debtors;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors ORDER BY debt_amount DESC;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, debt_date FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT debtor_id, SUM(debt_amount) AS total_debt FROM debt_history GROUP BY debtor_id;
SELECT debtor_id, debtor_name, debt_amount, debt_date FROM debtors;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors WHERE debt_amount > 5000;
SELECT debtor_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM debtors JOIN payments ON debtors.debtor_id = payments.debtor_id;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, debt_date, paid_status FROM debtors INNER JOIN debt_history ON debtors.debtor_id = debt_history.debtor_id;
SELECT report_id, analysis_date, report_text FROM analysis_reports WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM debtors;
SELECT debtor_name, phone_number, address FROM debtors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount FROM debtors JOIN debt_history ON debtors.id = debt_history.debtor_id;
SELECT debtor_name, amount FROM debts WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM analysis_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, amount, due_date FROM debts WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT debtor_name, debt_amount, payment_status FROM debt_history WHERE payment_status = 'pending' ORDER BY debtor_id ASC;
SELECT debtor_name, phone_number, address FROM debtors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY debtor_name;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date, analysis_results FROM analysis_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
